Package de.upb.cs.swtpra_04.qwirkle.model.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameData.GameDataListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bag
    Holds the data for the bag
    BagAdapter
    Handles the representation of data of tiles in the bag in a RecyclerView
    BagTest  
    BagTile
    Holds data for a tile shown in a cell in the bag
    BagTileTest  
    Board
    Holds data for the board Interface: GameData.GameDataListener Used to get notice of changes to the game data
    BoardTest  
    BoardTile
    Holds data to represent a tile on the board
    BoardTileTest  
    GameData
    Holds intern representation of the current game.
    GameDataTest  
    HandsAdapterPlayer
    Handles representation of the tiles a player holds in his hands in the list of the HandsFragmentPlayer.
    HandsAdapterSpectator
    Handles representation of the tiles a player holds in his hands in the list of the HandsFragmentPlayer.
    Player
    Holds data to represent a player
    SectionsPageAdapter
    Handles the tabs UI Elements that switch between Chat and Hands Fragments
    Tile
    Base Class for Tiles which holds universal information
    TileIds
    Holds a single field which contains every vector layout for the tiles
